body: Hire a photographer rather than expect random people to offer to do this for you for free
This is very helpful, thank you so much! Welcome Suica app it is!
I tried this through the JAL site and it just didn't want to let me book anything that was domestic in Japan.
I actually figured it out. It seems like it’s a bank authentication issue rather than visa thing. I switched from using my Chase card to Bank of America and it worked!
That's an excellent suggestion and I don't know why I didn't think of it that way. Thanks!
I was looking at $5000 to travel by myself.  Looks like it's $7K through the travel agency.  And I admit I want to enjoy myself while I'm in japan.  But 7K does feel expensive to me.
He said he'd be happy to pay for their time.
Were you on the .jp site? If not, try that.
i was able to book through the JAL site just a couple weeks ago for this coming week. you must be looking at the wrong site.

After flight tickets and hotel rooms for 2 weeks (splitting hotel room costs), I am still spending under half of that. For you, it shouldn't be over $3,000 for those alone, unless you are staying in nice/fancy hotels. Where did you get $5,000 from? Should be more than enough.
Hmm, I think I found the problem - I was trying to book too far in advance.  I tried with some closer dates and it appears to be working as intended!
